title: New: Labrador Van – IMA
body:
Only three tracks into their career, New Zealand four piece **Labrador Van** have already earmarked themselves out as having serious potential.

New track _IMA_ is quite possibly their finest too date, utilizing their silky smooth, almost **Radiohead**\-esque vocals and shoegaze inspired guitar lines. One of those few listens that really does end too soon, check it out below.
